name: Unfamiliar (itch) (DJWC)
description:
Welcome to the Beta!
  •  Thank you for playing Unfamiliar by PolyFish Games. Below you will find a few pointers to help make your beta testing experience a great one. These tips will also help us gather important information that will shape our development process going forward.
What to Expect:
  •  Unfamiliar is a walking simulator game with light puzzle and platformer elements.
  •  This game is in an unfinished state. As such, things like UI or level elements may be unpolished.
  •  After closing the game, you will be prompted with a Google Forms questionnaire where you can leave valuable feedback for the team to use going forward. Please be as detailed as possible in your responses. No feedback is too small or too large.
Beta Specific Controls:
  •  Since there is a small chance that levels may be broken, we have implemented temporary scene controls for the beta testers.
  •  Use '1' atop your keyboard to reload the previous scene.
  •  Use '2' atop your keyboard to reload the current scene.
  •  Use '3' atop your keyboard to load the next scene.
  • The num-pad will not work for these inputs.
